fixtures.name: default
fixtures.html:
<form class="lbcamden-search  " action="/"
      method="post" autocomplete="off" role="search">
  <label class="govuk-label govuk-label--l govuk-visually-hidden" for="lbcamden-search__box">
    Search Camden.gov.uk
  </label>
  <input type="text" name="search"
         class="lbcamden-search__input"
         value="Housing Repairs"
         id="lbcamden-search__box" " />
  <button type="submit" class="lbcamden-search__btn"
          id="lbcamden-search__btn">Search Camden.gov.uk</button>
</form>
